            # Polyfill

            ä»Babel 7.4.0 å¼€å§‹ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè½¯ä»¶åŒ…å·²ç»ä¸å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨äº†ï¼Œå»ºè®®ç›´æ¥åŒ…å« core-js/stableï¼ˆç”¨äºæ¨¡æ‹ŸECMAScriptåŠŸèƒ½ï¼‰ã€‚

            If you are compiling generators or async function to ES5, and you are using a version of @babel/core or @babel/plugin-transform-regenerator older than 7.18.0, you must also load the regenerator runtimeopen in new window package. It is automatically loaded when using @babel/preset-env's useBuiltIns: "usage" option or @babel/plugin-transform-runtime.
